name: NORT.
description:
You play as Nort, a novice ghost hunter attempting to clear a long-abandoned hospital of its ghosts. The hospital has been a legend within the ghost hunting community since its closure in 2007 and no one has the guts to explore. You must clear the hospital and find the secrets that lie within to become a ghost hunting legend*

*in New Jersey

Uses WASD to move and SPACEBAR to shoot.

This is my first game made in Unity so feedback is very much appreciated. There is currently only one ending to the game (death by ghost) but more are planned. I have included a .exe version of the game in case the web version does not work.

Text used: DPComic
